params.gasCost: Estimated gas cost for this bridge
params.name: Bridge adapter name (e.g., "Arbitrum", "Optimism")

returns.ethOk: Whether ETH/USD feed is valid and fresh
returns.usdcOk: Whether USDC/USD feed is valid and fresh

params._ethUsdPriceFeed: Address of ETH/USD Chainlink price feed
params._usdcUsdPriceFeed: Address of USDC/USD Chainlink price feed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.isSupported: Whether the chain should be supported
Whether the token should be supported

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

isChainSupported(uint256).notice: Check if a chain is supported

isTokenSupported(address).notice: Check if a token is supported

maxPriceStalenessSeconds().notice: Maximum allowed staleness for price feeds in seconds

removeBridgeAdapter(uint256,address).notice: Remove a bridge adapter for a specific chain

setBridgeAdapter(uint256,address).notice: Legacy function for backward compatibility - adds first bridge adapter

setMaxPriceStalenessSeconds(uint256).notice: Update the maximum allowed staleness for price feeds

supportedChains(uint256).notice: Mapping to track supported destination chains
